t: Home | STIGA Sports
s: STIGA Sports exists to make life more active and fun. The classic Swedish table tennis company with both hobby and professional products. In 1944, STIGA started its production of table tennis products and is today established as one of the world's largest brands of table tennis.

t: Stiga - Wikipedia
s: January 29, 2025 - The brand Stiga is today used by the Swedish company Stiga Sports for the production of sports products, including table tennis, snowriders and table hockey. Stiga started the production of table tennis products in 1938 and the production of hockey games in 1944.
